title: WHY HASN'T HARDEN SIGNED YET?
description:
J&J dive into Harden's contract situation: Why'd he opt out? Why hasn't he signed yet? Was it really team-friendly, or is he being asked to EARN that max money? And what will we define as "success" for this loaded Sixers team next year? All that, plus a look at John Wall's Clipper outlook, A surprising Vegas favorite for the NBA title, Banchero being shut down early from summer league, and Joker partying shirtless. I thought he was a footwork god? Oh, and Jacoby breaks down his recent run in with internet tomfoolery. You're gonna want to hear his reaction. Tap on! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
